text: Rachel Caine (born Roxanne Longstreet Conrad; April 27, 1962 â€“ November 1, 2020) was an American novelist. Many of her novels were science fiction, fantasy, mystery, suspense, and horror novels. Her works were for young adults. She was born in El Paso, Texas. She was best known for her The Morganville Vampires and Athena Force series. In 2018, Conrad was diagnosed with soft tissue sarcoma.Author Spotlight: Rachel Caine , at the Cedar Park Library; retrieved July 16, 2020 She died on November 1, 2020 from the disease in Texas, aged 58.It is with a heavy heart... ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:American novelists Category:Writers from El Paso, Texas Category:Deaths from soft- tissue sarcoma
title: Rachel Caine
